name: Delray Beach
description: Licensed Delray Beach electricians providing 24/7 expert services. From Atlantic Avenue commercial support to historic residential restorations, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.

challenges.title: Historic preservation & Modernization
challenges.description: Delray's charm lies in its history. Neighborhoods like Lake Ida require specialized electrical skills to safely modernize systems while respecting architectural heritage.

challenges.title: High-Density Commercial Support
challenges.description: The vibrancy of Atlantic Avenue requires electricians who can deliver fast, professional support for high-traffic retail, dining, and entertainment spaces.

challenges.title: Coastal Electrical Durability
challenges.description: Delray's coastal properties face salt air corrosion. We use marine-grade fixtures and specialized materials to ensure long-lasting outdoor power and lighting.

faqs.question: Do you work with restaurants and businesses on Atlantic Avenue?
faqs.answer: Yes, Atlantic Avenue's dining and entertainment district is a key part of our commercial work in Delray Beach. We understand the specific needs: kitchen electrical for restaurants, high-capacity circuits for commercial equipment, outdoor patio lighting and power, signage circuits, and the urgency of emergency repairs when every hour of downtime costs money. We work efficiently and around your business schedule.

faqs.question: Our Lake Ida home is historic—can you modernize the electrical sensitively?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Lake Ida's historic homes require electricians who understand how to add modern capacity while respecting architectural character. We can update panels, add grounded circuits, and install modern lighting without visible conduit runs or damage to historic features. We've worked on many downtown Delray historic properties and understand the aesthetic considerations.

faqs.question: What's different about electrical work in Delray's beach homes?
faqs.answer: Properties east of the Intracoastal face constant salt exposure that accelerates corrosion on electrical components. We use marine-grade enclosures, stainless hardware, and sealed connections for all beachfront work. Outdoor outlets, lighting fixtures, and panel enclosures all need upgraded materials to last in the coastal environment.

faqs.question: Do you serve artists and galleries in Pineapple Grove?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide electrical services for the creative businesses in Pineapple Grove Arts District. Gallery lighting, studio circuits for equipment, and the specialized needs of creative spaces are all within our expertise. We understand that lighting design is critical for showcasing art properly.

faqs.question: Is there anything unique about permitting in Delray Beach?
faqs.answer: Delray Beach is part of Palm Beach County's permitting jurisdiction, with additional requirements for work in the historic district. We handle all permitting and ensure work meets both county codes and any additional local requirements. Understanding the specific rules is part of our job.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond to emergencies in Delray Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide emergency electrical service throughout Delray Beach and the surrounding Palm Beach County area. Our technicians are positioned across South Florida to respond to critical situations including power failures, burning smells, and sparking outlets. Call us anytime—we're available 24/7, including weekends and holidays.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Delray Beach Electricians – Village by the Sea
seoContent.body: Delray Beach is a city that perfectly balances its award-winning 'Village by the Sea' charm with a sophisticated, modern energy. From Pineapple Grove to the sands of Atlantic Avenue, it's a community that values quality and character. Solomon Electric is proud to deliver that same standard of excellence to our Delray neighbors. Our electricians are dispatched from strategic locations across Palm Beach County, often arriving within 60 minutes. We maintain full parts inventory on every truck, so most repairs and installations are completed in a single visit.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Delray Beach Properties
seoContent.body: Whether your Delray Beach property needs panel upgrades, modern lighting, EV charging, or emergency repairs, our licensed electricians deliver solutions built for Palm Beach County's building codes and South Florida's demanding climate. We handle all permitting and inspections so you don't have to. Every project in Delray Beach is handled by W-2 employees—never subcontractors. Our electricians are drug-tested, background-checked, and carry our $2M liability insurance. We treat your home with the same care and respect we'd want in our own.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Neighborhood in Delray Beach
seoContent.body: From Lake Ida, Delray Isle, Tropic Isle to Valencia Falls, our electricians provide full-service coverage throughout Delray Beach. We understand the specific electrical characteristics of each area — from older homes that need rewiring to new construction requiring modern smart home systems. Delray Beach properties face unique electrical challenges from South Florida's heat, humidity, and storm exposure. We use marine-grade hardware, UV-resistant conduit, and corrosion-resistant components that last in this environment.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Delray Residents and Businesses
seoContent.body: Whether you're restoring a historic gem in Lake Ida, upgrading a boutique on Atlantic Ave, or needing urgent help near the beach, our licensed team is ready. We provide professional service, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that Delray Beach has trusted for over 18 years. From routine outlet installations to complex rewiring projects, we handle all aspects of residential and commercial electrical work in Delray Beach. Every job includes upfront pricing, clean worksite practices, and a satisfaction guarantee.
